snippet: Toyota is poised to pay more than $1 billion to settle a criminal investigation into disclosures around the sudden acceleration of its vehicles.
abstract: Toyota is poised to pay more than $1 billion to settle criminal investigation into disclosures around sudden acceleration of its vehicles, steep fine that caps a multi-year inquiry and provides a template for authorities pursuing similar case against General Motors; settlement, which is expected to be announced by Justice Department, will represent victory for the government.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and HIROKO TABUCHI

lead_paragraph: Toyota is poised to pay more than $1 billion to settle a criminal investigation into disclosures around the sudden acceleration of its vehicles.

headline.main: Toyota Expected to Settle Justice Dept. Investigation
headline.print_headline: Toyota Expected to Settle Justice Dept. Investigation
